name: Cecilia (Sekki_Ion)
description:
Your son is missing, and you need to find him. 

*All music used are placeholders, and will not be used in the final game. 

*The game is not complete at all, I'm just uploading it here because I'm doing it for a school project. I only have one route done,  the true end, along with two bad ends. There aren't CGs as well.
